module.exports = {

    title : 'My Store',
    firstname : 'testfirstname',
    lastname : 'testlastname',
    emailId : 'test142@somemail.com',
    password : 'pwd123',
    bday:'2',
    bmonth:'1',
    byr:'2001',
    company :'testcompany',
    address : 'testaddress',
    city : 'wichita',
    state : 'Kansas',
    postcode : '67052',
    mobile : '1234567891',
    product: 'Printed Summer Dress'

}
